headline: Allstate profit doubles to $3.8bn in Q4 2025
summary: The company’s expenses fell to $12.4bn in Q4 2025, down from $14.05bn in the same quarter the previous year.

raw.headline: Allstate profit doubles to $3.8bn in Q4 2025
raw.summary: The company’s expenses fell to $12.4bn in Q4 2025, down from $14.05bn in the same quarter the previous year.

headline: Allstate Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Allstate (NYSE:ALL) executives used the company’s fourth-quarter 2025 earnings call to highlight a sharp improvement in profitability, progress on insurance affordability initiatives, and continued momentum in its “Transformative Growth” strategy to expand market share across personal lines. Managem
